title: Smart Data Models - AnalogValue
description: Adapted from CIM data models. AnalogValue represents an analog MeasurementValue.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be AnalogValue

Analog.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The values connected to this measurement. Default: None

AnalogControl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The MeasurementValue that is controlled. Default: None

value.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The value to supervise. Default: 0.0
